abstract: A mechanic was found dead on railroad tracks in India after he reported that someone had tampered with the helicopter of Anil Ambani, the chairman of the Reliance ADA Group.
snippet: A mechanic was found dead on railroad tracks in India after he reported that someone had tampered with the helicopter of Anil Ambani, the chairman of the Reliance ADA Group.
lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI  It could be a story line worthy of “Law & Order,” the Indian version.

headline.main: A Billionaire, Sabotage and a Mysterious Death
headline.print_headline: A Billionaire, Sabotage And a Mysterious Death

abstract: Kenneth D. Lewis, a man who thrived on scoring the next big deal, found himself sunk by one, The Associated Press writes.
lead_paragraph: Kenneth D. Lewis, a man who thrived on scoring the next big deal, found himself sunk by one, The Associated Press writes.

headline.main: For BofA’s Lewis, Merrill Was One Deal Too Many
